price: ហើយនៅពេលដែលមានគេនិយាយទៅកាន់ពួកគេថាៈ ចូរពួកអ្នកឱនគោរព(ចំពោះអល់ឡោះ)ចុះ ពួកគេបែរជាមិនឱន គោរពទៅវិញ។
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
